runline.item_2: Free account setup with low minimum deposit

copytrad.title: WHAT IS COPY TRADING?
copytrad.description: What if you could trade like top investors without doing it all on your own? With Copy Trading, you simply choose an experienced trader, and their moves are automatically mirrored in your account. It’s a smarter, more connected way to invest — no charts, no stress, no guesswork.

step_1.label: Step 01
step_1.title: Sign up and explore top traders

step_3.label: Step 03
step_3.title: Copy a trader and let the platform do the rest

whycopy.title: WHY COPY TRADING?
whycopy.text: Built for results. Backed by regulation. Trusted worldwide

card_1.title: No experience required
card_1.text: You don’t need charts, strategies, or training — just choose a trader and the system handles the rest

card_2.title: Automated execution
card_2.text: Every trade made by your chosen trader is instantly mirrored in your account, with no manual action needed

card_3.title: You can pause or stop anytime
card_3.text: Want to take a break or switch to a different trader? You’re free to pause or exit at any moment

card_4.title: Transparent stats & full control
card_4.text: See each trader’s past performance, risk level, number of trades, and more — so you can make informed decisions

card_5.title: Earn passively alongside real traders
card_5.text: As they profit, you do too — without needing to stay glued to the markets

justcopy.title: LET THE EXPERTS TRADE — YOU JUST COPY
justcopy.text: You don’t need to learn charts or follow the news. Just pick a trader, set your amount, and the rest is automatic.

deposits.title: FAST AND SECURE DEPOSITS
deposits.text: Top up your account instantly using trusted global payment methods

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: New to trading? We’ve got answers
faq.q1: What is ST Trader and how does it work?
faq.a1: ST Trader is an online platform that gives you access to global markets. You can open an account, deposit funds, and start trading with tools designed for all levels of experience.
faq.q2: How much money do I need to begin?
faq.a2: You can open an account with as little as €50, but we recommend starting with at least €250 to take full advantage of the platform's features and tools.
faq.q3: Do I need to be an expert in trading?
faq.a3: Not at all. ST Trader is designed to be beginner-friendly, with simple interfaces and access to support and tutorials.
faq.q4: What can I trade on the platform?
faq.a4: You can trade stocks, indices, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and more — all from a single account.
faq.q5: Is ST Trader a safe and regulated platform?
faq.a5: Yes, your funds are protected, and we partner with regulated liquidity providers and insured payment processors.
faq.a6: Deposits can be made instantly via credit card, bank transfer, or other trusted payment methods listed in your account area.
faq.q7: How quickly can I withdraw my profits?
faq.a7: Withdrawals are usually processed within 24 hours, depending on your payment method and verification status.

copytop.title: Invest Smarter: Copy Top Traders Instantly
copytop.text: ST Trader gives you access to the world’s most popular markets with low costs, fast execution, and no hidden fees

footer.company_info: The website is owned and operated by ST Trader Ltd, a company registered in St. Lucia as an International Business Company (IBC) under registration number 2023-00987. The company’s registered office is located at Ground Floor, The Sotheby Building, Rodney Village, Rodney Bay, Gros-Islet, LC01 401, Saint Lucia. Its operational address is Mariano Roque Alonso Street 1344, Asunción, 001005, Paraguay.

risk.title: Risk Warning:
risk.text1: Trading leveraged instruments such as derivatives carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. You could lose all or part of your invested capital. Please ensure you fully understand the risks involved, consider your level of experience, investment goals, and, if necessary, seek independent financial advice before trading. Margin trading involves the possibility of both significant profits and significant losses.
risk.text2: Make sure to familiarize yourself with all related risks and take the appropriate steps to manage them effectively. For more information, please refer to our Risk Disclosure Notice.
